item.title: How to invest in ETFs and stocks from Taiwan
item.description: I’ve spent a tremendous amount of time investigating on how to invest effectively from Taiwan. Many expats asked me the questions, so I’ve decided to write down how do I do it. I’ll also write different options you could explore. This article will likely apply to non-US citizens. I’m also not a financial advisor, and invite you to make more research. My recommendation could also not fit you. Please seek professional advice.

item.title: Taiwan's amazing bike-sharing system
item.description: YouBike (or Ubike) is my first choice of transportation when it comes to moving around the city of Taipei. I largely prefer it over taking the subway, bus, or taxi. It is affordable, well maintained, comfortable, at waking distance reach from anywhere, and the cities have built great biking paths in the major cities. The number of YouBike rides keeps increasing steadily since it was launched in 2012.
